description:
Since 1983, the law firm of Bottar Leone, PLLC, has focused on helping accident victims and their families receive the compensation they deserve. Through our Binghamton, New York, office and five other office locations throughout upstate New York, we have successfully represented thousands of clients with their legal needs related to negligent injury and wrongful death.

Having over 100 years of combined legal experience means that our attorneys can take on any claim related to medical malpractice, product or premises liability, government negligence, workplace and vehicular accidents, or any other accident caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. Our vast experience and dedicated approach have helped us secure over $250 million in awards and settlements for our clients and has earned us the recognition and respect of our clients and peers.

Regardless of your means and position, if you suffered an injury or loss undeservedly, you have rights, and you need a legal ally who can help assert those rights to secure the restitution and benefits to which you are entitled. Our devoted attorneys will stand with you each step of the way to ensure you receive what you expect and deserve to help you move on with your life.

Those who have been victimized through negligent or wrongful actions and do not know where else to turn can rely on the attorneys of Bottar Leone, PLLC, for unmatched legal representation and effective results. Do not fight the battle alone. Contact our law office for a free initial consultation to discuss your case and discover how our attorneys can fight for you so you can focus on your recovery and your future.
